item.title: Report X-2023071013
item.description:
Report X-2023071013

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-13
  • City: GRIMES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was discovered among others needing to be repacked outside a trailer. The box was placed in a plastic-lined tote and brought to QA. There was minimum spillage, since the bulk of escaped liquid was contained by plastic bags. What had escaped quickly evaporated. DescribePack: It is difficult to determine where the leaks are, but they appear to be from the bottom of the cans or possible a side seam. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed in a plastic-lined tote and removed from the work area as soon as it was found and secured until we could process the DPR and other forms.
